item.name: BlueCoat PerCent CpuBusy
item.description: The amount of time the proxy has been running since boot, in milliseconds.

item.name: BlueCoat PerCent CpuIdle
item.description: The amount of time the proxy has been running since boot, in milliseconds.

item.name: BlueCoat CpuUpTime
item.description: The amount of time the proxy has been running since boot, in milliseconds.

item.name: Median DNS service time 1
item.description: The median DNS service time, in milliseconds.

item.name: Median DNS service time 5
item.description: The median DNS service time, in milliseconds.

item.name: Network avg byte rate for all responses
item.description: The average byte rate for all HTTP responses, in bytes per second.

item.name: Network avg byte rate for all hits
item.description: The average byte rate for all HTTP hits, in bytes per second.

item.name: Network avg byte rate for all misses
item.description: The average byte rate for all HTTP misses, in bytes per second.

item.name: Client Statistics Percentage hit rate (by requested bytes)
item.description: The percentage HTTP hit rate (by requested bytes). This is the number of bytes returned to the client for hits, as a fraction of the total bytes.

item.name: Connections proxy-clients total
item.description: The total number of HTTP connections with the proxy clients.

item.name: Connections proxy-clients active
item.description: The number of active HTTP connections with the proxy clients.

item.name: Connections proxy-clients idle
item.description: The number of idle HTTP connections with the proxy clients.

item.name: Client Statistics HttpClientErrors connections
item.description: The number of HTTP errors caused by client connections.

item.name: Client Statistics Percentage hit rate (by objects)
item.description: The percentage HTTP hit rate (by objects).

item.name: Client Statistics HttpClientInBytes
item.description: The number of bytes received from the clients by the proxy.

item.name: Client Statistics HttpClientOutBytes
item.description: The number of bytes delivered to clients from the proxy.

item.name: Client Statistics avg requests per second
item.description: The average rate per second of HTTP requests.

item.name: Client Statistics HttpClientRequests
item.description: The number of HTTP requests received from clients.

item.name: Network First Byte avg time first response byte all requests
item.description: The average time to first response byte for all HTTP requests, in milliseconds.

item.name: Network First Byte avg time first response byte all hits
item.description: The average time to first response byte for all HTTP hits, in milliseconds.

item.name: Network First Byte avg time first response byte all misses
item.description: The average time to first response byte for all HTTP misses, in milliseconds.

item.name: Network First Byte avg time first response byte all partial (near) hit
item.description: The average time to first response byte for all HTTP partial (near) hits, in milliseconds.

item.name: Median service time for all requests 1
item.description: The median service time for all HTTP requests, in milliseconds.

item.name: Median service time for all requests 5
item.description: The median service time for all HTTP requests, in milliseconds.

item.name: Median service time for all hits 1
item.description:
The median service time for all HTTP hits, in milliseconds.
HTTP- .

item.name: Median service time for all hits 5
item.description: The median service time for all HTTP hits, in milliseconds.

item.name: Median service time for all misses 1
item.description: The median service time for all HTTP misses, in milliseconds.

item.name: Median service time for all misses 5
item.description: The median service time for all HTTP misses, in milliseconds.

item.name: Median service time for all partial (near) hits 1
item.description: The median service time for all HTTP partial (near) hits, in milliseconds.

item.name: Median service time for all partial (near) hits 5
item.description: The median service time for all HTTP partial (near) hits, in milliseconds.

item.name: Connections remote-servers total
item.description: The total number of HTTP connections with remote servers.

item.name: Connections remote-servers active
item.description: The number of active HTTP connections with remote servers.

item.name: Connections remote-servers idle
item.description: The number of idle HTTP connections with remote servers.

item.name: Response time avg service all requests
item.description:
The average service time for all HTTP requests, in milliseconds.
HTTP- .

item.name: Response time avg service all hits
item.description:
The average service time for all HTTP hits, in milliseconds.
HTTP- .

item.name: Response time avg service all misses
item.description:
The average service time for all HTTP misses, in milliseconds.
HTTP .

item.name: Response time avg service all partial (near) hits
item.description:
The average service time for all HTTP partial (near) hits, in milliseconds.

item.name: BlueCoat Memory Available
item.description: The total memory available for use by the proxy.

item.name: BlueCoat Memory CacheUsage
item.description: The memory used by the proxy for object caching.

item.name: BlueCoat Memory Pressure
item.description: The proportion of memory used in total by the proxy, as a percentage of the total memory available.

item.name: BlueCoat Memory SystemUsage
item.description: The memory used by the proxy for system and support processes.

item.name: Cache Number objects
item.description: The number of objects currently held by the proxy.

item.name: BlueCoat Configuration serial number
item.description: Hardware serial number of the proxy appliance.

item.name: BlueCoat ConfigurationName proxy
item.description: Name of the proxy software.

item.name: Cache storage use
item.description: The quantity of storage in use by the proxy.

item.name: BlueCoat Configuration version
item.description: Version of the proxy software.
